pages.text:
This block is for decoration and for storing ant queens.
Place this block down by shift rightclicking with an $(l:antsportation:items/ant_jar)ant jar item.$()
If the ant jar is broken while there is an ant inside, the ant will pop out and the jar will break. $(bold)$(#ff0000)The jar will only drop with silktouch!!!
pages.title: Ant Jar Block
